structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.text: The person selling shall, within ten days after the sale, file in the clerkâ€™s office a report on oath of the sale and of his doings, and the court may confirm the sale or set it aside and order a re-sale. Any person interested may appear or be summoned, and the order of the court confirming the sale shall be conclusive evidence against all persons that the power of sale was duly executed.
